name: Randomized Hurt SFX
author: Moosh
info: A simple global script to randomize the SFX when Link gets hurt.
description: A simple global script to randomize the SFX when Link gets hurt.
setup: Set the three SFX_LINKHURT constants to the sounds that can play when Link is hurt. If you want more or less hurt sounds, you can add/remove constants from the hurtSFX[] array and the list of constants. The first number in the array keeps track of Link's state so don't change that one.Requires std.zh.
